segments.text: The most wonderful time of the year.
Snow is falling, lights are shimmering,
Santa has finally been taken care of,
and I've taken his place.
Oh, wait.
If I'm Santa and today is December 25th...
Oh, no! Oh, no, no, no, no, no!
Oh, Shiitake!
I was supposed to deliver presents to the fans!
Hmm?
Ah, Mumei! Can you help me?
I was supposed to get a present for the fans.
Isn't that Santa's job?
Don't mention that name around me.
Who?
Right, do you know what the fans want for Christmas?
I'm all out of ideas.
A weapon?
Do you think that's a good idea?
Oh, what about a letter?
We can put all of our feelings into it.
Our feelings!
I sure have a lot of those.
Here, I'll start.
I hope you'll have a Merry Christmas.
I think it would be more meaningful if everyone signs it.
Hey, Mumei, can you make sure everyone signs this before it's delivered?
Oh, sure!
Thanks, Mumei!
I gotta go figure out presents for everyone else in the world, I guess.
Bye, Riss!
Oh, silly Iris. Now I can do whatever I want to this letter.
Maybe some berry juice? Some pretty art?
Oh, hi, Callie.
Yo, Mumei, what you got there?
Oh, it's a letter.
Yeah? Who's it for?
Actually, Iris gave it to me because she said now she forgot to get a gift for the fans,
so now we're writing them a letter, but now everyone needs to sign it.
So Iris asked me if I could make sure everyone signs it, and now you're here,
so why don't you sign it and make sure it gets to the next person,
and make sure you put your feelings into it, okay?
Okay, bye.
What?
That girl! Ah, okay! So I just have to sign this letter?
Tally! Oh, is that the present for the fans?
Yeah! Wait, how did you know about this?
I made sure they were on Iris' nice list.
Well, maybe some of them deserve to be on the naughty list, but I figured I'd be merciful this year.
Really feeling the Christmas spirit, huh, Kiara?
It looks like Iris decided on a letter!
Something about getting everyone to put their feelings into it!
Feelings? Let me see...
Huh? Why is it red? That's not blood, is it?
Berry juice? Or maybe mulled wine?
Hmm... How about we turn it into a cute little Christmas hen?
Looks like you have it all under control!
Thanks, Tenshou! Make sure it gets to everyone else!
Bye!
Wait, wait! I didn't say...
Ugh, what's up?
Oh man! Just the girl I wanted to see!
Could you do me a favor?
Hmm, that depends. What do you need?
Can you get the rest of the girls to sign this?
It's a letter for the fans!
Oh, for Christmas?
Yeah!
A gift from all of us to them!
A letter, huh?
Did you ever think about...
No, no, no, no! Don't make more work for yourself!
I need you to be free for Christmas so we can spend some time together!
Yeah, but what if we just...
Don't forget about our plans!
Make sure everyone signs it!
I'll see you soon, Ame.
Hehehe, adding a little something special wouldn't hurt anybody.
Just a little bonus present from Watson Industries.
Are we causing mischief?
Oh, hi Fauna!
Uh, uh, no, no, I was just...
Something about adding an extra something special from Watson Industries?
No! Wait!
How do you...
I was listening the whole time.
Oh, in that case, wanna help me?
Hmm...
As long as no one's around...
Oh! Hey guys!
I GOTTA GO! TAKE CARE OF THIS FOR ME, VANA!
Ooooooh...
Where'd Ami go?
She... um...
Hey Crony, what do you think about gag gifts?
Gag?! Like...
No, like...
Prank presents.
Oh! No, I wouldn't do something like that.
If I'm giving a gift, it has to be perfect.
Ah, right, of course! Uh, me too!
Wouldn't even think of playing a prank on our precious fans.
Wait, a gift for the fans?
Yeah! Do you want to help?
We could use the signature of someone perfect like you.
Sure!
And collect everyone else's signatures too for me, will you?
Wait, what?
Kuro-nichiwa!
Domo-chan!
Hey, it's Christmas!
Stuff it, sock.
Can I get a break just for today?
You started it.
And I'm finishing it.
Hey, will you sign this?
What do you want my signature for?
Gonna sell it on eBay?
Didn't realize you were hurting for cash, crony.
I changed my mind.
I don't need your signature at all.
Wait, wait, wait, wait.
What was it for?
Wouldn't you like to know?
Come on.
It's a gift for the fans. A letter from all of us.
Oh! Can I sign it?
Here.
But now that you have it, you have to make sure everyone else signs it too!
Kuroyasumi!
Oii!
Alright, who can I pawn this off to?
Hmm...
Ah! Ina!
Wah!
Good! Take this!
Wah!
You know what to do with this, right?
Wah!
Great! Thanks, Ina! See ya! Merry Christmas!
Hey, Ina!
Wah!
Huh? Oh, what's that?
You want me to sign this and give it to the fans?
Wah!
Got it!
So, this is for you, huh?
Let's see what it says.
To the fans of HoloEN, we hope you're having a merry Christmas and happy holiday.
Thank you for always supporting us in everything we do.
Because of you, we're able to chase our dreams and keep reaching for the stars.
Behind every performance, every stream and every song, you are there cheering us on.
We couldn't do it without you.
From the bottom of our hearts, thank you for supporting Holla EN.
Merry Christmas!
